event_registry_properties.name: action
event_registry_properties.item: Use <tt>fmdump -v -u <EVENT_ID></tt> to identify the suspected drivers/modules. Ensure latest patches are installed. If your patches are up to date contact Sun Services.
event_registry_properties.name: description
details
impact
event_registry_properties.item: Possible loss of devices or services that may be attached to the system via this Software. This message is caused by a normally correctable event. It may however generate a number of messages and should be investigated.
event_registry_properties.name: po-action
event_registry_properties.item: Ensure latest driver and patch are installed. Use <tt>fmdump -v -u <EVENT_ID></tt> to identify the module/package, or contact Sun for support.
event_registry_properties.name: po-impact
event_registry_properties.item: Loss of services provided by the device instances associated with this problem
event_registry_properties.name: title
